## Example R Analysis

```{r}
dataset <- readr::read_csv("data/data.csv")
```

### Example Interactive Table

```{r}
DT::datatable(dataset, 
              rownames = FALSE, 
              filter="top", 
              options = list(pageLength = 5, scrollX=T) )
```

### Example Plot

```{r}
plot1 <- ggplot2::ggplot(dataset, aes(x = Month_Ordered, y = Variable_1)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

plot1
```


### Example Dynamic Plot

```{r plotly=TRUE}
plotly::ggplotly(plot1) %>%
  as.widget() %>% list() %>% tagList()
```
